learning_outcomes: Master Reduced relative clauses and formal relative pronouns at CAE level
Expand vocabulary in Defining and Non-defining context
Enhance stylistic precision and register awareness

content.prompt_es: Completa con el pronombre relativo adecuado:
content.stimulus_en: The person to ______ you should speak is the manager.

content.prompt_es: Transforma usando una clÃ¡usula relativa reducida:
content.stimulus_en: The students who are living in the dorms are happy. -> The students ______ in the dorms are happy.
